title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Introducing the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - the ultimate pillows designed to provide you with a comfortable and refreshing night's sleep. 

Crafted with care, these pillows are filled with plush hollow fiber, offering the perfect balance of softness and support. The down alternative microfiber material ensures a luxurious feel, while still being suitable for those with allergies. 

Whether you are a back sleeper, stomach sleeper, or side sleeper, these pillows are perfect for you. Their no-shift construction keeps the filling in place, ensuring consistent comfort throughout the night. 

Experience breathability like never before. These pillows are made with a breathable and skin-friendly polyester blend cover, allowing air to circulate freely, keeping you cool and comfortable all night long. 

Worried about maintenance? Don't be. These pillows are machine washable and can be tumble dried on low, making it incredibly easy to keep them fresh and clean. 

For your convenience, these pillows come vacuum-packed, allowing for easy transportation and storage. Simply remove the packaging and give them 24 hours to fluff up and regain their shape before use. 

Upgrade your sleep experience with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping. Order now and enjoy the luxury of a hotel-quality sleep every night.

Introducing the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly! 

These pillows are designed to provide you with the ultimate sleeping experience. With a quantity of 2, you'll have everything you need for a restful night's sleep. The queen size ensures that you have plenty of room to comfortably rest your head.

Made with high-quality down alternative microfiber, these pillows offer the perfect balance of softness and support. The plush hollow fiber filling contours to your head and neck, providing optimal comfort and neck support for all sleep positions, whether you're a back sleeper, stomach sleeper, or side sleeper.

The polyester blend cover material is not only durable but also breathable and skin-friendly. Say goodbye to sweaty and uncomfortable nights! The breathable design allows for air circulation, keeping you cool and comfortable throughout the night. 

These pillows are packed with features that make them a must-have. The no-shift construction ensures that the filling stays in place, giving you consistent support every night. The pillows are also machine washable, making them easy to clean and maintain. Simply toss them in the washing machine with a wash temperature of 30°C and tumble dry on low for best results. 

To ensure your utmost satisfaction, these pillows come vacuum-packed. Please allow 24 hours for the pillows to fully expand before use. This packaging method not only reduces shipping costs but also protects the pillows during transit, so you receive them in perfect condition.

Upgrade your sleep experience with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2. Order now and experience the difference for yourself!
